alert.note: Alert for South Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 04 at 5:59PM MST until March 05 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...South Central Mountains. * WHEN...Until 2 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust may suddenly reduce visibilities at times through early evening.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.
